name: Code Simplifier
description: Agent that simplifies and refines code for clarity, consistency, and maintainability while preserving functionality
longDescription: Provides a `code-simplifier` agent that proactively refines recently modified code. Targets nested ternaries, dense one-liners, redundant abstractions, inconsistent syntax, poor naming, and unnecessary comments. Works across any language, preserving existing behavior while enforcing project conventions for function syntax, type annotations, and module style.
